import React from 'react' import CartItem from '../CartItem/CartItem' import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' const CartDropdown = ({cartItems, history}) => {console.log("dropdown cartItems:") console.log(typeof cartItems) console.log(cartItems) return(
{ cartItems ? ( cartItems.map(cartItem =>() )) : (No cart items) }
)} export default CartDropdown
